Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "If I die, I'm taking my hero down with me."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Earth Revenant
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Have you guys seen a pair of rock legs lying around anywhere?

Forged in the Barrens.name: Gruntled Patron
Forged in the Barrens.text: Frenzy: Summon another Gruntled Patron.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Gruntled and whelmed.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Injured Marauder
Forged in the Barrens.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Invigorating Sermon
Forged in the Barrens.text: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Kazakus, Golem Shaper
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, build a custom Golem.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: With a little love and some tenderness, we’ll CRUSH OUR FOES!

Forged in the Barrens.name: Kurtrus Ashfallen
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Attack the left and right-most enemy minions. Outcast: Immune this turn.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Kurtrus fled the Black Temple, abandoning Illidan's cause, to seek revenge against the Dreadlord Anetheron.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Oil Rig Ambusher
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If this entered your hand _this turn, deal 4 instead.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Days since last accident: 0

Forged in the Barrens.name: Outrider's Axe
Forged in the Barrens.text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "I only have to get 4 Zhevra hooves? How hard could that be?"

Forged in the Barrens.name: Piercing Shot
Forged in the Barrens.text: Deal $6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Goblins hate wasting money on unnecessary ammunition.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Plaguemaw the Rotting
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]After a friendly minion with Taunt dies, summon a new _copy of it without Taunt.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: This is why you should brush your teeth three times a day!

Forged in the Barrens.name: Pride's Fury
Forged in the Barrens.text: Give your minions +1/+3.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Day 4: I think they're starting to suspect.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Rancor
Forged in the Barrens.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to all
minions. Gain 2 Armor
for each destroyed.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Wise men say "Only fools rush in." Wise Orcs say the opposite.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Reckless Apprentice
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Fire your Hero Power at all enemies.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: It’s all a great learning experience until someone accidentally aggros the boss.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Scabbs Cutterbutter
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Combo: The next two cards you play this turn cost (3) less.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Never lie, steal, cheat, or drink. Unless you're compelled to, that is…" —Scabbs Cutterbutter

Forged in the Barrens.name: Sin'dorei Scentfinder
Forged in the Barrens.text: Frenzy: Summon four 1/1 Hyenas with Rush.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Loves candles. Hates deodorant.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Soul Rend
Forged in the Barrens.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to all
minions. Destroy a card in
your deck for each killed.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: About as close to feeling guilt as a warlock's ever going to get.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Southsea Scoundrel
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your opponent's deck. They draw theirs as well.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "…and here we see the Southsea Scoundrel in their natural habitat: a den of scum and villainy."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Spirit Healer
Forged in the Barrens.text: After you cast a Holy spell, give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "You again? What did I tell you about trying to fight ALL the quilboars."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Stealer of Souls
Forged in the Barrens.text: The first card you draw each turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: The tooth fairy gig didn't work out.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Thickhide Kodo
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 5 Armor.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: The introduction of professions was devastating for kodo populations.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Varden Dawngrasp
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Freeze all enemy minions. If any are already Frozen, deal 4 damage to them instead.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Varden Dawngrasp could wield fire, summon hailstorms, and morph a night elf into a sheep with a snap of their fingers. Knowing how malleable reality could be, certain labels felt downright trivial.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Vengeful Spirit
Forged in the Barrens.text: Outcast: Draw 2 Deathrattle minions.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Sheesh, even the spirits are edgy when it comes to Demon Hunters.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Venomstrike Bow
Forged in the Barrens.text: Poisonous
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "You know you only have to coat the arrowhead in poison and not the entire bow, right?"

Forged in the Barrens.name: Veteran Warmedic
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]After you cast a Holy spell, summon a 2/2 Medic with Lifesteal.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: In times of war, warmedics bring their own medics.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Void Flayer
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: The Void, just like onions, has flayers.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Warsong Wrangler
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Beast from your deck. Give all copies of it +2/+1 (wherever_they_are).
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Me? Playing favorites? I love my beasts all the same!"

Forged in the Barrens.name: Whirling Combatant
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry and Frenzy: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: It's called capoeira! And yes, it is dangerous!

Forged in the Barrens.name: Xyrella
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, deal that much damage to all enemy minions.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: On the Night of Falling Stars, Xyrella had a vision of a shattered naaru. "Go to the Barrens," the being said. "Seek the shards of my broken body. Restore me, and I will restore your daughter."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Against All Odds
Forged in the Barrens.text:
Destroy ALL
odd-Attack minions.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Time to EVEN out the playing field.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Barak Kodobane
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a 1, 2, __and 3-Cost spell.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: They say he's a pro at horseback archery.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Barrens Blacksmith
Forged in the Barrens.text: Frenzy: Give your other minions +2/+2.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Maybe someday you’ll make it to Gadgetzan, kid."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Burning Blade Acolyte
Forged in the Barrens.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/8 Demonspawn with Taunt.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Wields a disappointingly normal looking blade.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Cannonmaster Smythe
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Transform your Secrets into 3/3 Soldiers. They transform back when they die.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Smythe, it's been a real blast serving the Alliance with you."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Gold Road Grunt
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Taunt Frenzy: Gain Armor equal to the damage taken.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: No, no, no, Gold Roads are very different from Yellow Brick Roads.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Lilypad Lurker
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, transform an enemy minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Honestly, the frog did nothing wrong.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Mor'shan Elite
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, summon a copy of this.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Fear not the orc who has slain a million training dummies, but the orc who keeps CAMPING MY CORPSE!"

Forged in the Barrens.name: Neeru Fireblade
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, open a portal that fills your board with 3/2 Imps each turn.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Look at this guy! He’s obviously evil! OBVIOUSLY!!!

Forged in the Barrens.name: Priest of An'she
Forged in the Barrens.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, gain +3/+3.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "An’she?" "Bless you!" "No, you, An'she…" "Bless you again!"

Forged in the Barrens.name: Razormane Raider
Forged in the Barrens.text: Frenzy: Attack a random enemy.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Call me hedgehog one more time. I dare you."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Refreshing Spring Water
Forged in the Barrens.text:
Draw 2 cards.
Refresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Mana" is just another name for "electrolytes."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Shadow Hunter Vol'jin
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Swap it with a random one in its owner's hand.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: You wouldn’t see this swap-meet on the Zandalari Roadshow.
Forged in the Barrens.howToGet: Unlocked when opening a Forged in the Barrens pack.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Stonemaul Anchorman
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Rush Frenzy: Draw a card.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Brug will read anything you put on the parchment prompter. Anything."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Barrens Scavenger
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) while your deck has 10 or fewer cards.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: When the hundredth centaur dropped, so did her bracers.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Floecaster
Forged in the Barrens.text: Costs (2) less for each Frozen enemy.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: His real name is Melvin, but he prefers his friends call him ... <sigh> ..."Floecaster."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Kresh, Lord of Turtling
Forged in the Barrens.text: Frenzy: Gain 8 Armor. Deathrattle: Equip a 2/5 Turtle Spike.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Never should have flushed him.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Lady Anacondra
Forged in the Barrens.text:
Your Nature spells
cost (2) less.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Do you think she got her name before or after she turned into a snake?

Forged in the Barrens.name: Lightshower Elemental
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to all friendly characters.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Taurajo Brave
Forged in the Barrens.text: Frenzy: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "He's brave, but splinters will make any Tauren cry."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Death Speaker Blackthorn
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Deathrattle minions that cost (5) or less from your deck.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: He can speak death but has a hard time reading it.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Druid of the Plains
Forged in the Barrens.text: Rush Frenzy: Transform into a 6/7 Kodo with Taunt.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Not to be confused with the aeronautically advanced Druid of the Planes.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Kargal Battlescar
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Lookout for each Watch Post you've __summoned this game.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: One if by land, two if by tree.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Mutanus the Devourer
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Eat a minion in your opponent's hand. Gain its stats.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: As long as Naralex stays under the blanket, Mutanus can't get him.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Overlord Saurfang
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Resurrect 2 friendly Frenzy minions. Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Eats more than his fair share of sour candy.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Party Up!
Forged in the Barrens.text: Summon five 2/2 Adventurers with random bonus effects.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Random? But what if we don't get a tank?

Forged in the Barrens.name: Selfless Sidekick
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon from your deck.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "I got a real sense of humility from her when she bashed that quilboar's head in."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Celestial Alignment
Forged in the Barrens.text: Set your Mana Crystals to 0. Set the Cost of cards in your hand and deck to (1).
Forged in the Barrens.flavor:
"Is my deck any good?"
"I mean, if the stars align."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Deviate Dreadfang
Forged in the Barrens.text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 4/2 Viper with Rush.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Even with wings, snakes STILL don't have legs.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Mordresh Fire Eye
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've dealt 10 damage with your Hero Power this game, deal 10 damage to all enemies.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: You're not hardcore unless you died hardcore.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Power Word: Fortitude
Forged in the Barrens.text: Give a minion +3/+5. Costs (1) less for each spell in your hand.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Part of a balanced breakfast.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Primordial Protector
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw your highest Cost spell. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: I thought the "shape of water" meant something else.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Taintheart Tormenter
Forged in the Barrens.text: Taunt Your opponent's spells cost (2) more.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Oh boo hoo, did someone's World Tree burn down?
